channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- VPN Plus Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- VPN Plus Server

item.title: CVE-2022-43931|2024-08-03T13:40:06.582Z -- synology -- vpn%20plus%20server
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in Remote Desktop Functionality in Synology VPN Plus Server before 1.4.3-0534 and 1.4.4-0635 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.
